mapper.select: SELECT id,type,title,detail,orderby,viewnum FROM sys_help ORDER BY viewnum DESC LIMIT 0,3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_help( id, type, title, update_date, create_date, detail, orderby, viewnum ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{update_date}, #{create_date}, #{detail}, #{orderby}, #{viewnum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_help SET type = #{type}, title = #{title}, update_date = #{update_date}, detail = #{detail}, orderby = #{orderby}, viewnum = #{viewnum} WHERE id = #{id}
